headline: Caterpillar Rides AI Data Center Boom As Earnings Story Evolves
summary: Caterpillar is emerging as a key supplier to the AI infrastructure buildout, providing heavy equipment for data center construction and systems for on site power. The company reports record revenues and a strong order backlog tied to AI related data centers and upgrades across its equipment portfolio. Recent product developments include technology improvements in mining equipment that support data intensive operations. For investors watching industrial names, Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) is...
